paris.activities: Visit Eiffel Tower, Try a baguette, Watch a mime, Cruise the Seine

tokyo.activities: Visit Shibuya Crossing, Try sushi, See cherry blossoms, Explore Akihabara

new york city.activities: See Times Square, Visit Statue of Liberty, Walk in Central Park, See a Broadway show

barcelona.activities: Visit Sagrada Familia, Walk Las Ramblas, Try paella, Explore Park Güell

maui.activities: Road to Hana, Snorkel at Molokini, Watch sunrise at Haleakalā, Attend a luau

aspen.activities: Skiing/snowboarding, Visit Maroon Bells, Explore downtown Aspen, Relax at hot springs
